title.no: Ny utgivelse - Guardian Angels av Haaker
title.en: New release - Guardian Angels by Haaker

content.no:
Ny kramgod metallåt fra Pål er nå ute 🤘
Jeg har hatt gleden av å spille klaviaturinstrumenter på denne 🎹🎛
content.en:
A smoking hot metal song from Pål is now out 🤘
I've had the pleasure of playing keyboard instruments on this one 🎹🎛

thumbnailDescription: Album cover for the single "Guardian Angels" by Haaker

title.en: Wine glasses with tape echo and reverb

content.no: Sender opptak av vinglass gjennom en Fulltone Tube Tape Echo båndekko og Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 romklang 🍷📼🦄🔊
content.en: The recorded audio from wine glasses sent through a Fulltone Tube Tape Echo and a Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 reverb 🍷📼🦄🔊

thumbnailDescription: Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 reverb and a Fulltone Tube Tape Echo delay
